puppet: file { '/etc/myapp': ensure => directory, owner => 'root', group => 'root', mode => '0755' }
ansible:
- name: Ensure /etc/myapp exists
  ansible.builtin.file:
    path: /etc/myapp
    state: directory
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: '0755'

- name: Ensure httpd is running
  ansible.builtin.service:
    name: httpd
    state: started
    enabled: yes
